Diversity

Rent the Runway has always been diverse across every metric, including gender, race, ethnicity, sexual orientation, and background. Our founders value a wide range of experiences and perspectives and believe magic happens when they come together. We’re building a transformative company with a team that doesn’t look like the traditional leadership at most technology companies. For that we are proud.

EQUALITY

Rent the Runway would not be successful without the hard work and dedication of our team. We owe it to our employees to take care of them. For that reason, we provide equal benefits to all employees across our corporate, retail, and warehouse teams.

EQUALITY

Why We Work Here

John Doe
Engineering
Since 2019
“Work-life balance can be challenging, but we
get creative and like everything else we do at
RTR, we make that work also. I have a sense of
pride and ownership here that I’ve never had
working anywhere else. My team is more than
my team, they are an extension of my family.”

Alums

Once you’re part of the Pocketle Family, you have our support for life as your career grows and evolves. We could not be more proud of alums that have founded their own companies.
